cnbc.title: Trump extends China tariff deadline by 90 days
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order that will prevent U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods from spiking for another 90 days.

cnbc.title: Trump flip-flops on Intel CEO, calls him 'success' days after demanding resignation
cnbc.summary: President Trump said Monday that he met with Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan, days after calling on the chipmaker to resign.

cnbc.title: Trump says he's nominating E.J. Antoni as Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner
cnbc.summary: President Trump, who claimed former BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer of manipulating jobs data, said Antoni would release "honest and accurate" numbers.

cnbc.title: ESPN, Fox to bundle upcoming streaming services for $39.99 a month
cnbc.summary: ESPN and Fox will offer their upcoming direct-to-consumer streaming services as a bundle beginning in October.

cnbc.title: Trump puts Washington, DC, police under federal control, deploys National Guard
cnbc.summary: Trump in a social media post on Sunday declared that "the Homeless" in Washington, D.C., will "have to move out."

cnbc.title: Sinclair is exploring merger options for its broadcast business
cnbc.summary: Sinclair, one of the largest owners of broadcast stations in the U.S., is launching a strategic review of its broadcast business that could result in a merger.

cnbc.title: Trump says gold will not be tariffed
cnbc.summary: A ruling by U.S. Customs and Border Protection that gold bars from Switzerland were subject to tariffs surprised the market.

cnbc.title: Travel card benefits are 'getting harder to maximize,' analyst says. What to know before you apply

cnbc.title: Can Stitch Fix make a comeback? Inside the company's return to growth
cnbc.summary: Pandemic darling Stitch Fix has seen its stock price crater since its 2021 highs, but the company is in the midst of a comeback under new CEO Matt Baer.

cnbc.summary: StubHub updated its IPO prospectus on Monday, effectively restarting the process to go public.
